resources.string:
" This is a companion app for Samsung Gear App \"GPX Route Tracker\". This companion app is used to transfer a GPX file from your phone to your Gear watch.

Details of the "GPX Route Tracker" app can be found below:
https://sites.google.com/site/gpxroutetracker/


Instructions:


Step 1 - On your watch:


1a. Launch GPX Route Tracker
1b. Click on ... (Settings) -> Add Route -> New
1c. Click \'Send from Phone\'

Step 2 - On your phone:


2a. Click \'Connect\' button if it is not already Connected
2b. Enter Route Name
2c. Click \'Choose GPX File\'
2d. Click \'Send\'

Step 3 - Go back to your watch - Done


"
